Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Darkangel : :

Darkangel: Yes sir! Finally we can do this!

Darkangel leaps into the air, transforming to bot mode. He starts to fire down on the Pred base.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
OOC: Remember them?

They had waited a long time. Too long. But now was the time.

Tyrael: Tripredacus, we will strike now! Deathsteel has seemingly gone
silent, and we must strike while the Predacons grow complacent.
Kaiser, aim for any defenses and blow them up ASAP. Darkangel,
Dreadplague, fly up and distract enemy ground forces. Dread, ground
the enemy air forces. Dragoon, you're with me. Hydras must die today!

He liberated his light, making the surrounding bayou as luminescent as
if a giant light bulb had been suddenly turned on.  He moved quickly,
hovering over the murky waters in order to surprise his enemies the
most. The major was determined to win this time, and his forces were
strong.
